LanguageData.ESCP_Tools_BoneChitinFat_EnableLoggingOn: Enable logging of patches on game start.
LanguageData.ESCP_Tools_BoneBoneFat_BoneMultiplier: Percentage based multiplier for the amount of ESCP bone obtained from butchering.
LanguageData.ESCP_Tools_BoneChitinFat_ChitinMultiplie: Percentage based multiplier for the amount of ESCP chitin obtained from butchering.
LanguageData.ESCP_Tools_BoneFatFat_FatMultiplier: Percentage based multiplier for the amount of ESCP fat obtained from butchering.
